name: Feeling the extraordinary new things in Long Xuyen City!
description: In Long Xuyen, you will go for a sight-seeing of floating market, a distinctive market in Mekong River Delta region of Vietnam; discover life of crocodiles in Long Xuyen Crocodile farm; pay a visit in holy places as Ong Bac, Quang Te Pagodas, My Phuoc Temple; experience the magnanimous history of An Giang in An Giang Museum; have an amazing tour to Ong Ho Island to visit commemorative area of late President Ton Duc Thang...and more destinations for you to enjoy...!
